text: Shivraj Vishwanath Patil (born 12 October 1935) is an Indian politician. He was the Governor of the state of Punjab and Administrator of the Union Territory of Chandigarh from 2010 to 2015. He was the Speaker of the 11th Lok Sabha from 1991 to 1996. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Lok Sabha Category:Governors of Punjab, India Category:Administrators of Chandigarh Category:Governors of Rajasthan Category:Politicians from Maharashtra
title: Shivraj Patil
